Biography

2023-24 (Senior)

Competed in all 11 tournaments, averaging a score of 73.0 across 30 rounds. Earned his best finish in a tie for 14th place at the WCC Championships. Made an eagle at the Visit Stockton Pacific Invitational. Named to the WCC All-Academic First Team.

2022-23 (Junior)

Competed in all ten of the team's tournaments, averaging a score of 73.2. Placed in the top ten of tournaments twice (Ram Master's Invitational and Wyoming Cowboy Classic). Earned a third-place finish at the Wyoming Cowboy Classic with a 209 (-7). Earned a tenth-place finish at the Ram Master's Invitational with a two-under-par 206 (-2).

2021 (Sophomore)

Competed in all seven of the team's tournaments during the shortened spring season. Finished tied for No. 11 overall at the Grand Canyon Invitational, shooting a 215 (+2) across three rounds.

2019-20 (Freshman)

Recorded a 74.83 stroke average as a freshman in four tournaments, including Pacific's first three. Finished second on the team at the season-opening Ram Masters Invitational with a 216. Carded a season-low 70 in the second round of the Nick Watney Invitational.

High School

Played at Gymnázium Studentská in the Czech Republic, where he is a part of the Czech Republic National Team. Posted top-10 finishes in the Czech International Junior U18 & U21 Championships, Czech International Match Play Championships and Czech Amateur Tour 1. Finished second overall at the 2018 Evolve Spanish Junior Championship with a 223.
